scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android --justlaunch
scripts.debug.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug ios --emulator
scripts.debug.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug android --emulator
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-algolia && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
scripts.test.ios: cd demo && tns platform remove ios && tns test ios --emulator
scripts.test.ios.device: cd demo && tns platform remove ios && tns test ios
scripts.test.android: cd demo && tns platform remove android && tns test android --justlaunch
